meanings.definition: A recurring theme or idea in a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The motif of love is prevalent throughout the novel.
meanings.sent2: The use of nature as a motif in the painting adds depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The motif of friendship in the story brought a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a motif that echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The motif of courage shone brightly in the hero's actions.

meanings.definition: A distinctive feature or dominant idea in a design or composition.
meanings.sent1: The floral motif on the fabric made the dress stand out.
meanings.sent2: The architectural motif of the building reflected modern aesthetics.
meanings.sent3: The motif of stripes and polka dots together was an interesting choice.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a motif that defined his character.
meanings.sent5: The motif of waves in the painting seemed to come alive.
